name: Technorol
tag_list: printing-blanket, press-roller, encreurs, impression-offset, rouleau-en-caoutchouc, regarnissage, rouleau-de-presse, blanchet-imprimerie
overview:
Technorol specializes in the re-covering of rubber rollers for printing presses. We also manufacture printing blankets and distribute press and ink products.

Our representatives combine a broad range of experience in the field of printing. With their extensive knowledge in the field of print, they can answer any questions you have about rollers, blankets and ink products. Our representatives will even travel to your site to ensure you get the very best results from your printing products.

Technorol is a training organization approved by the Commission des partenaires du marché du travail. Part of the Commission’s mandate is the implementation of an act which fosters skill development and recognition of the workforce. Our professional expertise extends to the fields of chemistry and biology as well as communication and documentation.
